response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, representing years of innovation and dedication. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to own a piece that not only stands out in quality but also promises to be a valuable asset in the future. We believe this offer presents a fantastic balance between the product's intrinsic value and its market potential. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 850000}
